DOC.brief_title: Visual Function Changes After Intraocular Pressure Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: Primary open angle glaucoma patient without use antiglaucoma medication enrol study . After inclusion , patient randomly receive one three antiglaucoma medication ( timolol maleate 0,5 % , brimonidine tartrate 0,2 % travoprost 0,004 % ) one randomly select eye . The patient evaluate Goldmann applanation tonometry , visual acuity test , contrast sensitivity test , visual quality perception test ( visual analogue scale ) standard automate perimetry 4 week glaucoma treatment onset .
